text: 11:26 Matyu 12:45; Jon 5:14; Hibru 6:4; 2 Pita 2:20Egh duar kurar kam mangɨ, 7plan duar kurar a gafiragha arazir kurabagh amiba, men aku izam. Egh me mangɨ, dɨpenir kamɨn ikiam. Gumazir kam faragha paza ike, egh a datɨrɨghɨn bar pazavɨra ikiam, eghtɨ an dabirabim, dabirabir a faragha ikezim bar a gafiragh bar ikuvigham.”
